name: Warriors Orochi
description: In Warriors Orochi, the characters from both franchises must team up to wage war against this new yet powerful force. The game boasts an amazing roster of 79 playable characters, while four action-packed "crossover" storylines feature amazing team-ups and some long-awaited confrontations between characters from both series. The game's new "team battle system" and "weapon fusion" push tactical action to a whole new level.
